Body:
Description: Hi Team,

I'm creating current ticket on behalf of Directi team that reported that the CAP policy is not applying for email subject and email body although under Content Aware Protection > Deep Packet Inspection:
Monitor webmail - is turned ON
Outlook is selected from the "Select Parser:" dropdown
DPI is enabled for the Windows computer where tests were performed

EPP Server version: 5.9.4.1.
EPP client version: 6.2.4.2000

Please let us know if other details would be required here.

Thank you,

Oana Nemes | Team Lead, Customer Success
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com  
(+40) 264-593 110

Next Steps Updated: We will gather more details regarding the issue.

Schedule a remote session after receiving the information.

What We've Learned Updated: Customer reported that the CAP policy is not applying for email subject and email body although under Content Aware Protection > Deep Packet Inspection:
Monitor webmail - is turned ON
Outlook is selected from the "Select Parser:" dropdown
DPI is enabled for the Windows computer where tests were performed

EPP Server version: 5.9.4.1.
EPP client version: 6.2.4.2000

Next Steps Updated: We will gather more details regarding the issue.

Schedule a remote session after receiving the information.

Customer is testing internally if the situation is still persisting.
